subject: Antitrust Laws and Competition Issues
Suits and Litigation
Football
Lockouts
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. players indicated in a court filing Friday that they planned to proceed with their antitrust lawsuit no matter how an appeals court rules on an injunction to stop the lockout.
snippet: N.F.L. players indicated in a court filing Friday that they planned to proceed with their antitrust lawsuit no matter how an appeals court rules on an injunction to stop the lockout.
